text.section:
Any individual who is licensed under Subtitle 3 of this title or certified under Subtitle 4 of this title may not charge a client or receive remuneration for counseling or therapy services unless:
Before the performance of those services, the client is furnished a copy of a professional disclosure statement; or
This professional disclosure statement is displayed in a conspicuous location at the place where the services are performed; and
A copy of the statement is provided to the client on request.
